:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
Review a timeline of workflows running or previously run:

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### On models

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa cubes >}} Inventory**.

2. Select a model or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.^[[Working with the model inventory](/guide/model-inventory/working-with-model-inventory.qmd#search-filter-and-sort-models)]

3. On the landing page of your model, locate the Workflows section.

    If workflows are running or have previously run on your model, you can:

    - Filter the view using the **[show]{.smallcaps}** drop-down menu to display only runs from specific workflows.

    - Click **{{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} See All Workflows** to see records of workflows by status:
        - **Active** — Workflows currently running.
        - **Scheduled** — Workflows slated to run in the future.
        - **Waiting** — Workflows in a {{< fa clock >}} Wait state.^[[Conditional requirements](/guide/workflows/setting-up-workflows.qmd#conditional-requirements)]
        - **Finished** — Workflows that have reached an {{< fa circle-stop >}} End state.^[[Workflow step types](/guide/workflows/setting-up-workflows.qmd#workflow-step-types)]
        - **Aborted** — Cancelled workflows.^[[Abort workflows](/guide/workflows/manage-workflows.qmd#abort-workflows)]
        - **Available** — Workflows available to be run manually.^[[Initiate model workflows](/guide/workflows/manage-workflows.qmd#initiate-workflows)]

#### On findings

On the details page of your finding,^[[View and filter model findings](/guide/model-validation/view-filter-model-findings.qmdl#view-model-findings)] locate the [active workflows]{.smallcaps} section.

If workflows are running or have previously run on your finding, you can:

- Filter the view using the **[show]{.smallcaps}** drop-down menu to display only runs from specific workflows.

- Click **{{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} See All Workflows** to see records of workflows by status:
    - **Active** — Workflows currently running.
    - **Scheduled** — Workflows slated to run in the future.
    - **Waiting** — Workflows in a {{< fa clock >}} Wait state.^[[Conditional requirements](/guide/workflows/setting-up-workflows.qmd#conditional-requirements)]
    - **Finished** — Workflows that have reached an {{< fa circle-stop >}} End state.^[[Workflow step types](/guide/workflows/setting-up-workflows.qmd#workflow-step-types)]
    - **Aborted** — Cancelled workflows.^[[Abort workflows](/guide/workflows/manage-workflows.qmd#abort-workflows)]
    - **Available** — Workflows available to be run manually.^[[Initiate model workflows](/guide/workflows/manage-workflows.qmd#initiate-workflows)]

:::

:::: {.content-hidden unless-format="revealjs"}
Review a timeline of workflows running or previously run on a model:

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa cubes >}} Inventory**.

2. Select a model or find your model [by applying a filter or searching for it](/guide/model-inventory/working-with-model-inventory.qmd#search-filter-and-sort-models){target="_blank"}.

3. On the landing page of your model, locate the Workflows section. If workflows are running or have previously run on your model, you can:

    - Filter the view using the **[show]{.smallcaps}** drop-down menu to display only runs from specific workflows.

    - Click **{{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} See All Workflows** to see records of workflows by status:
        - **Active** — Workflows currently running.
        - **Scheduled** — Workflows slated to run in the future.
        - **Waiting** — Workflows in a [{{< fa clock >}} Wait state](/guide/workflows/setting-up-workflows.qmd#conditional-requirements){target="_blank"}.
        - **Finished** — Workflows that have reached an [{{< fa circle-stop >}} End state](/guide/workflows/setting-up-workflows.qmd#workflow-step-types){target="_blank"}.
        - **Aborted** — [Cancelled workflows.](/guide/workflows/manage-workflows.qmd#abort-workflows){target="_blank"}
        - **Available** — Workflows available to be [run manually](/guide/workflows/manage-workflows.qmd#initiate-workflows){target="_blank"}.
